snippet: Albert Pujols, the high-paid slugger, did not have a home run in his first month with the Angels, his new team, who begin May with an 8-15 record.
abstract: Los Angeles Angels defeat Minnesota Twins, 4-3; Angels first baseman Albert Pujols, who did not hit a single home run in April, goes 1-for-4 with a double in the first inning.
lead_paragraph: Albert Pujols, the high-paid slugger, did not have a home run in his first month with the Angels, his new team, who begin May with an 8-15 record.

headline.seo: Angels Await Those First Sparks From Pujols
headline.main: Angels Await First Sparks, and Blasts, From Pujols After a Barren April
headline.print_headline: Angels Await First Sparks, and Blasts, From Pujols After a Barren April
